ourFourCoreYugas.title: Our Four Core Yuga's
ourFourCoreYugas.satyaDesc: The first and best age, characterized by truth, righteousness (dharma), long life, health, and divine connection.
ourFourCoreYugas.tretaDesc: A slight decline from Satya Yuga; the time of the Ramayana, with less spiritual perfection.
ourFourCoreYugas.dvaparaDesc: Further decline; shorter lives, more conflict; the era of the Mahabharata and Krishna's departure.
ourFourCoreYugas.kaliDesc: The current age, marked by strife, ignorance, and materialism; spiritual practices are more difficult but still possible.

heading: शान्ताकारम् भुजगशयनम् पद्मनाभम् सुरेशम्।
विश्वाधारम् गगनसदृशम् मेघवर्णम् शुभाङ्गम्।
लक्ष्मीकान्तम् कमलनयनम् योगिभिर्ध्यानगम्यम्।
वन्दे विष्णुम् भवभयहरम् सर्वलोकैकनाथम्॥
krishnaBg.transliteration: I bow to Vishnu—Who has a peaceful demeanor (Shanta-karam)...

heading: ॐ भूर्भुवः स्वः
तत् सवितुर्वरेण्यम्
भर्गो देवस्य धीमहि
धियो यो नः प्रचोदयात्
gayathri.transliteration: Om Bhur Bhuvah Svah Tat Savitur Varenyam Bhargo Devasya Dheemahi Dhiyo Yo Nah Prachodayat
gayathri.translation: We meditate upon the desirable effulgence of the divine Sun, the impeller. May he stimulate our intellects.

heading: ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे
सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्।
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्
मृत्योर्मुक्षीय माऽमृतात्॥
shiva.transliteration: Oṃ tryambakaṃ yajāmahe sugandhiṃ puṣṭi-vardhanam | Urvarukam iva bandhanān mṛtyor mukṣīya māmṛtāt ||
